item.title: Commander beret
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“h1 sk1ller, post:30, topic:355560”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=452114.msg3314484#msg3314484 date=1282204091]

I was in JROTC, and no offense, but this doesn’t look much like the beret’s we wore on the drill-team. Here is an example. Yes, I realize yours is a ‘commander beret’, but its still the same concept.

EDIT - Unless your in a different country than i am, in that case, it could be right. Lmfao. Anyways, the model itself ill give an 8/10

That was CC whether you like it or not. Mainly because of the picture. There is no gold area on the band. Was no spot for a logo.
[/quote]

If you were so smart you should have asked for a refence picture douche… I just edited it abit

[/quote]
Could have mentioned you used one from the beginning? Think about things before making commands, that simple pic could have saved you and me much time.

Read full topic

item.title: Commander beret
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:27, topic:355560”][quote author=h1 sk1ller link=topic=452114.msg3314452#msg3314452 date=1282200026]

Yeah, I wouldn’t know anything right?? Your just saying its a waste of time because you can’t make one better or even anywhere close to as good as it… Fuck off go troll someone else or ill get mad and you will fucking lose…

You should know a person before trying to accuse them of being poor at sculpting models. Anybody here who knows me, knows you are wasting your time trying to act as if your the best around.

Im not acting like im the best, its just you fucking idiots keep pissing me off…

Every person who pisses you off, is pointing out mistakes, to only make you better. Once you realize that, you will stop starting the arguments on a retarded reason.

Okay then show me an example…

I already showed what was wrong. You could have taken that information and made the simple correction. You chose not to, your fault. Argument done. I’m going to be the mature one and walk away.

From what?? Trolling me?? GTFO
[/quote]
Again, “I’m going to be the mature one and walk away”. You don’t know the different between CC, or Trolling. CC is spotting mistakes, and giving tips, Trolling is never giving a reason. At least you got that from me. I can get krackkid back on ya if need be, hes a true troll.[/quote]

Yet you still haven’t shown me the quote from constructive criticism that you have given me…

Read full topic
